knimeNode.name: R Snippet (Local)
knimeNode.shortDescription: Allows execution of R commands in a local R installation.

fullDescription.intro:
Allows execution of R commands in a local R installation. The result of these R commands is returned in the output table of this node. All input data is written to a CSV file which is then processed together with the R commands. The result likewise in the variable R is written to CSV file again and then passed into KNIME.
Be aware that if you use commands like png() or bmp() etc. you will open a new graphic device to draw the plot to. This means that the graphic device used by this node to display the plot is not used anymore and the view will show a white empty image.
fullDescription.option: Path to the local R executable. Note that it is possible to specify the path to the local R executable also in the R section of the KNIME preferences.

views.view:
The text sent to standard out during the execution of the external tool. (If it appears in gray, it's the output of a previously failing run which is preserved for your trouble shooting.)
NOTE: Keeping the view open may slow down the process significantly, if it produces a lot of output in a short amount of time.
The text sent to standard err during the execution of the external tool. (If it appears in gray, it's the output of a previously failing run which is preserved for your trouble shooting.)
